mapper.insert: INSERT into knowlg_content (id, title, `desc`, content, type_id, second_type_id, state, read_num, create_id, create_time) VALUES(#{id}, #{title}, #{desc}, #{content}, #{typeId}, #{secondTypeId}, #{state}, #{readNum}, #{createId}, #{createTime})
mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.title, a.type_id typeId, a.second_type_id secondTypeId, a.content FROM knowlg_content a WHERE a.id = #{id}

SELECT a.id, a.title, a.content, CASE a.state WHEN '1' THEN '审核中' WHEN '2' THEN '审核通过' WHEN '3' THEN '审核不通过' END state, CASE a.state WHEN '1' THEN 'state-new' WHEN '2' THEN 'state-up' WHEN '3' THEN 'state-down' END colorClass, DATE_FORMAT(a.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') createTime, a.read_num readNum, c.`name` typeName, d.`name` secondTypeName FROM knowlg_content a LEFT JOIN knowlg_type c ON a.type_id = c.id LEFT JOIN knowlg_type d ON a.second_type_id = d.id WHERE a.id = #{id}

SELECT a.id, a.title, a.typeName, a.secondTypeName, a.createTime, a.createUser FROM (SELECT a.id, a.title, a.type_id, a.second_type_id, c.`name` typeName, d.`name` secondTypeName, a.create_time, date_format(a.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %k:%i') createTime, b.user_name createUser FROM sys_eve_user_staff b, knowlg_content a LEFT JOIN knowlg_type c ON a.type_id = c.id LEFT JOIN knowlg_type d ON a.second_type_id = d.id WHERE a.state = '1' AND a.create_id = b.user_id) a WHERE 1 = 1
AND a.title LIKE '%${title}%'
AND a.type_id = #{typeId}
AND a.second_type_id = #{secondTypeId}
AND a.createUser like '%${createUser}%'
AND a.create_time >= #{startTime} AND #{endTime} >= a.create_time
ORDER BY a.create_time DESC

SELECT a.id, a.title, c.`name` typeName, d.`name` secondTypeName, a.content FROM knowlg_content a LEFT JOIN knowlg_type c ON a.type_id = c.id LEFT JOIN knowlg_type d ON a.second_type_id = d.id WHERE a.id = #{id}

SELECT a.id, a.title, CASE a.state WHEN '1' THEN '审核中' WHEN '2' THEN '审核通过' WHEN '3' THEN '审核不通过' END state, CASE a.state WHEN '1' THEN 'state-new' WHEN '2' THEN 'state-up' WHEN '3' THEN 'state-down' END colorClass, c.`name` typeName, d.`name` secondTypeName, a.content, b.user_name createName, DATE_FORMAT(a.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %k:%i') createTime FROM sys_eve_user_staff b, knowlg_content a LEFT JOIN knowlg_type c ON a.type_id = c.id LEFT JOIN knowlg_type d ON a.second_type_id = d.id WHERE a.id = #{id} AND b.user_id = a.create_id

SELECT a.id, a.title, CASE a.state WHEN '1' THEN '审核中' WHEN '2' THEN '审核通过' WHEN '3' THEN '审核不通过' END state, CASE a.state WHEN '1' THEN 'state-new' WHEN '2' THEN 'state-up' WHEN '3' THEN 'state-down' END colorClass, c.`name` typeName, d.`name` secondTypeName, a.content, a.examine_nopass_reason examineNopassReason, e.user_name examineName, DATE_FORMAT(a.examine_time,'%Y-%m-%d %k:%i') examineTime, a.read_num readNum, b.user_name createName, DATE_FORMAT(a.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %k:%i') createTime FROM sys_eve_user_staff e, sys_eve_user_staff b, knowlg_content a LEFT JOIN knowlg_type c ON a.type_id = c.id LEFT JOIN knowlg_type d ON a.second_type_id = d.id WHERE a.id = #{id} AND b.user_id = a.create_id AND a.examine_id = e.user_id
SELECT a.id, a.title, DATE_FORMAT(a.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') createTime FROM knowlg_content a WHERE a.state = 2 ORDER BY a.examine_time DESC LIMIT 20
SELECT a.id, a.title, a.`desc`, b.`name` FROM knowlg_content a, knowlg_type b WHERE a.second_type_id = #{id} AND a.second_type_id = b.id AND a.state = 2 ORDER BY a.examine_time DESC

SELECT a.id, a.title, a.`desc`, b.`name` FROM knowlg_content a, knowlg_type b WHERE a.state = 2
AND (a.title LIKE '%${searchName}%' OR a.`desc` LIKE '%${searchName}%')
AND a.second_type_id = b.id ORDER BY a.examine_time DESC
